OOC: Add this to my last.

BlackFortress's Computer::

The computer erased all memories and Maximal Program and reprogramed 
the femme to be a Predacon loyal to the leader of BlackFortress, 
Darkfate  and loyal to Shivah second in rank.

Together all the Predacon program, the computer planter inside Panzer 
a virus that would be actived if someone attemped to reprogram Panzer.

A signal that computer did, advice Shivah that Panzer's reprogrmation 
process had ended. Shivah knew that she soon would be awake.
